thread.title: menu element issues

comments.text: menu elements (buttons, shapes, etc) will occasionally break off and go to the area origin. they still function as intended when the menu is reopened, but once it's closed (1/2)
thanks for the note! if you spot any causes for this, like the last thing you did when it happened, pls let us know too!
